唔好扭計.en: don't behave in a childlish way just to get what you want; don't be so petulant; don't kick up so much fuss [colloquial]

唔洗死.en: it's not that bad, you won't need to give up your life [colloquial]

地頭龍.en: someone who holds powerful influence over a particular area [colloquial]

子彈人.en: a man who ejaculates very quickly during sex [colloquial]

托炮.en: to do something pointless; to try to do something that is beyone one's ability [colloquial]

搵來講.en: to talk just for the sake of talking; to give a feeble excuse for something [colloquial]

擺門.en: to set up a trap to trick someone [colloquial]

柳暗花明又一村.en: there is always light at the end of the tunnel; the darkest hour is that before the dawn; every cloud has a silver lining; there is always other way out [written and colloquial]

樣炳.en: an ugly face; an angry face; a bad situation [colloquial]

粉筆字.en: literally: chalk character; refers to something that one should forget about and leave behind in the past [colloquial]

街鐘宵夜殺馬.en: to pay for a nightclub hostess to be taken out of a bar, followed by dinner and sex [colloquial]

過火位.en: to overstep the mark; to have gone too far [colloquial]

飽肚食.en: to eat ,  take on a full stomach [colloquial]
